title: Binge-Eating Disorder
description: A comprehensive guide to Binge-Eating Disorder, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Binge-Eating Disorder is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Feeding and Eating Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
